sql.query: select BSTAPP_NO,BST_COMPANYNAME,BST_COMPANYID, org_name, BSTAPP_STATUS, usr_fname ,TO_CHAR(BSTMAIL_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as maildate from combst_mailbox a,combst_applications b,com_bstcustinfo c,organisations d,users e where a.bstmail_appno= b.bstapp_no and e.usr_id= a.BSTMAIL_FROMUSRID and upper(b.bstapp_status) not like 'C_' and c.bst_brlocation= d.org_scode and b.bstapp_comid= c.bst_companyid and a.bstmail_tousrid ='^' and b.bstapp_delflag='N' and a.bstmail_date =(select max(a1.bstmail_date) from combst_mailbox a1 where a.bstmail_appno= a1.bstmail_appno) order by a.bstmail_date desc
select bstapp_no from combst_applications a, com_bstcustinfo b where a.bstapp_comid= b.bst_companyid and upper(a.bstapp_status) in (^) and b.bst_companyid='^'

select broadtermsfinappno, broadtermsfinslno, broadtermsfinfirstyear, broadtermsfinsecondyear, broadtermsfinthirdyear, broadtermsfinrowdesc from combst_financials where broadtermsfinappno='^' order by to_number(broadtermsfinslno)
insert into combst_financials (broadtermsfinappno, broadtermsfinslno, broadtermsfinfirstyear, broadtermsfinsecondyear, broadtermsfinthirdyear, broadtermsfinrowdesc) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from combst_financials where broadtermsfinappno = ?
select com_broadtermsappno, com_broadtermstype, com_broadtermscomments, com_broadtermsseltype from combst_comments where com_broadtermsappno='^' and com_broadtermstype in(^)

select com_broadtermsappno, com_broadtermstype, com_broadtermscomments, com_broadtermsseltype from combst_comments where com_broadtermsappno='^' and com_broadtermstype in(^) and com_broadtermsseltype in ('^')
delete from combst_comments where com_broadtermsappno=? and com_broadtermstype = ? and com_broadtermsseltype=?
insert into combst_comments (com_broadtermsappno, com_broadtermstype, com_broadtermscomments, com_broadtermsseltype) values (?,?,?,?)
select bstcp_appno, bstcp_billscommission, bstcp_processcharges, bstcp_lgcommission, bstcp_sb, bstcp_cd, bstcp_ownsources, bstcp_thirdparty from combst_custprofit where bstcp_appno='^'
insert into combst_custprofit(bstcp_appno, bstcp_billscommission, bstcp_processcharges, bstcp_lgcommission, bstcp_sb, bstcp_cd, bstcp_ownsources, bstcp_thirdparty) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from combst_custprofit where bstcp_appno=?

select bst_companyname, bst_companygroup, bst_brlocation, to_char(bst_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bst_modifieddate, bst_modifiedby, bst_companyid, bst_companycustid, org_name as brnlocationdesc, exp_desc as groupdesc, bst_custype from com_bstcustinfo, organisations, exposure where org_scode(+)=bst_brlocation and exp_id(+)=bst_companygroup and bst_companyid='^'
insert into com_bstcustinfo(bst_companyname, bst_companygroup, bst_brlocation, bst_modifieddate, bst_modifiedby, bst_companyid, bst_companycustid,bst_custype) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?)
update com_bstcustinfo set bst_companyname=?, bst_companygroup=?, bst_brlocation=?, bst_modifieddate=sysdate, bst_modifiedby=?, bst_custype=? where bst_companyid=?
delete from com_bstcustinfo where bst_companycustid=?
select bstcustinfoseq.nextval as companyid from dual

select bst_companyname, bst_companygroup, bst_brlocation, to_char(bst_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bst_modifieddate, bst_modifiedby, bst_companyid, bst_companycustid, org_name as bst_brlocationdesc from com_bstcustinfo, organisations where upper(bst_companyname) like upper('%^%') and bst_renew='N' and bst_brlocation= org_scode and org_code like '^%'

select bstfacilities_appno, bstfacilities_headid, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=bstfacilities_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, bstfacilities_id, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=bstfacilities_id and facility_parent!=0) as facdesc, bstfacilities_existing, bstfacilities_proposed, bstfacilities_creditint, bstfacilities_propint, bstfacilities_margin, bstfacilities_tenor, bstfacilities_purpose, bstfacilities_intreset, to_char(bstfacilities_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as bstfacilities_createdate, bstfacilities_facgroup, bstfacilities_sno from combst_facilities where bstfacilities_appno='^' and bstfacilities_facgroup='^'

insert into combst_facilities(bstfacilities_appno,bstfacilities_sno, bstfacilities_headid, bstfacilities_id, bstfacilities_existing, bstfacilities_proposed, bstfacilities_creditint, bstfacilities_propint, bstfacilities_margin, bstfacilities_tenor, bstfacilities_purpose, bstfacilities_intreset, bstfacilities_createdate,bstfacilities_facgroup) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)

update combst_facilities set bstfacilities_headid=?, bstfacilities_id=?, bstfacilities_existing=?, bstfacilities_proposed=?, bstfacilities_creditint=?, bstfacilities_propint=?, bstfacilities_margin=?, bstfacilities_tenor=?, bstfacilities_purpose=?, bstfacilities_intreset=?, bstfacilities_createdate=sysdate,bstfacilities_facgroup=? where bstfacilities_appno=? and bstfacilities_sno=?
delete from combst_facilities where bstfacilities_appno=? and bstfacilities_sno=?
select NVL(max(bstfacilities_sno),0)+1 as facilityid from combst_facilities where bstfacilities_appno='^'

select bstfacilities_sno, facility_catdesc, bstfacilities_proposed from facility_master, combst_facilities where facility_parent = 1 and facility_catid=bstfacilities_id and bstfacilities_appno='^' order by facility_catdesc

select facility_catdesc, com_broadtermscomments, com_broadtermstype, bstfacilities_proposed from facility_master, combst_comments, combst_facilities where facility_catid=bstfacilities_id and bstfacilities_sno=com_broadtermsseltype and bstfacilities_appno=com_broadtermsappno and com_broadtermsappno='^'
select NVL(SUBSTR(max(BSTAPP_NO),7,14),'0') as appno from combst_applications where SUBSTR(BSTAPP_NO,1,5) ='^'

insert into combst_applications (bstapp_no, bstapp_usrid, bstapp_orgscode, bstapp_applnholder, bstapp_createdate, bstapp_processorgscode, bstapp_orglevel, bstapp_valuesin, bstapp_status,bstapp_comid) values (?,?,?,?,sysdate, ?,?,?,'op',?)
select bstapp_no, bstapp_usrid, bstapp_applnholder, bstapp_approvedby, bstapp_sancauthcomments, bstapp_status from combst_applications where bstapp_no= '^'
select nvl(max(bstsec_srlno),0)+1 as snomax from combst_securitydetails where bstsec_appno='^'

insert into combst_securitydetails(bstsec_appno, bstsec_srlno, bstsec_desc_id, bstsec_desc_details, bstsec_desc_value, bstsec_desc_as_on_date, bstsec_tenor, bstsec_type, bstsec_valuersname, bstsec_insuranceamt, bstsec_insexpirydate, bstsec_remarks) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)

update combst_securitydetails set bstsec_desc_id=?, bstsec_desc_details=?, bstsec_desc_value=?, bstsec_desc_as_on_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), bstsec_tenor=?, bstsec_type=?, bstsec_valuersname=?, bstsec_insuranceamt=?, bstsec_insexpirydate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), bstsec_remarks=? where bstsec_appno=? and bstsec_srlno=?
delete from combst_securitydetails where bstsec_appno=? and bstsec_srlno=?

select bstsec_appno, bstsec_srlno, bstsec_desc_id, bstsec_desc_details, bstsec_desc_value, to_char(bstsec_desc_as_on_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as as_on_date, stat_data_desc as sec_name, bstsec_tenor, bstsec_type, bstsec_valuersname, bstsec_insuranceamt, to_char(bstsec_insexpirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_insexpirydate, bstsec_remarks from combst_securitydetails, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=bstsec_desc_id and bstsec_appno='^' order by bstsec_srlno

select bstsec_appno, bstsec_srlno, bstsec_desc_id, bstsec_desc_details, bstsec_desc_value, to_char(bstsec_desc_as_on_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as as_on_date, stat_data_desc as sec_name, bstsec_tenor, bstsec_type, bstsec_valuersname, bstsec_insuranceamt, to_char(bstsec_insexpirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_insexpirydate, bstsec_remarks from combst_securitydetails, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=bstsec_desc_id and bstsec_srlno='^' and bstsec_appno='^'

select bstapp_status,bst_companyname,bstapp_applnholder,bstapp_valuesin,org_name from combst_applications,com_bstcustinfo,organisations where org_scode = bstapp_orgscode and bstapp_comid=bst_companyid and bstapp_no='^'

select bstapp_no, bstapp_status, bstapp_applnholder, usr_fname||' '||usr_lname as holdername from com_bstcustinfo, combst_applications, organisations, users where bstapp_comid=bst_companyid and bst_companycustid='^' and bstapp_applnholder=usr_id and bstapp_orgscode=org_scode and org_code like '^%'

insert into com_bstcustinfo(BST_COMPANYNAME, BST_COMPANYGROUP, BST_BRLOCATION, BST_MODIFIEDDATE, BST_MODIFIEDBY, BST_COMPANYID, BST_COMPANYCUSTID,bst_custype) select BST_COMPANYNAME, BST_COMPANYGROUP, BST_BRLOCATION, BST_MODIFIEDDATE, BST_MODIFIEDBY, ?, BST_COMPANYCUSTID,bst_custype from com_bstcustinfo where BST_COMPANYID=?
update com_bstcustinfo set bst_renew='Y' where BST_COMPANYID=?
select bst_workid,bst_minclass,bst_duration,wrk_flowname,bst_flowpoint from bst_workflow,workflow where bst_workid=wrk_flowid and wrk_flowtype='^' order by bst_flowpoint
delete bst_workflow where bst_workid in (select wrk_flowid from workflow where wrk_flowtype=?)
insert into bst_workflow(bst_flowpoint, bst_workid, bst_minclass, bst_duration) values(?,?,?,?)
select bstmail_toflowpoint,to_char(bstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as bstmail_date from combst_mailbox where bstmail_date=(select max(bstmail_date) from combst_mailbox where bst_appno='^' )
select count(bstmail_fromflowpoint) from combst_mailbox where bstmail_appno='^' and bstmail_fromflowpoint=^

select bstmail_fromusrid||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname as fromuser, bstmail_tousrid||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||' '||usr2.usr_lname as touser,bstmail_fromflowpoint,bstmail_toflowpoint, to_char(bstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as maildate, bstmail_fromusrid, bstmail_tousrid from combst_mailbox, users usr1,users usr2 where bstmail_appno like '^' and bstmail_fromusrid=usr1.usr_id and bstmail_tousrid=usr2.usr_id order by bstmail_date
insert into combst_mailbox(bstmail_appno, bstmail_fromusrid, bstmail_tousrid, bstmail_fromflowpoint, bstmail_toflowpoint, bstmail_date) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
update combst_applications set bstapp_applnholder=? where bstapp_no=?
update combst_applications set bstapp_status=?, bstapp_approvedby=?, bstapp_processdate=sysdate, bstapp_processorgscode=?, bstapp_sancauthcomments=? where bstapp_no=?

select bstmail_toflowpoint, to_char(bstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as bstmail_date, to_char(bst_duration+bstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, bst_minclass from combst_mailbox, bst_workflow where bstmail_appno='^' and bstmail_date=(select max(bstmail_date) from combst_mailbox where bstmail_appno='^') and bst_flowpoint=bstmail_toflowpoint

select bst_minclass, to_char(bstapp_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as createdate, to_char(bst_duration+bstapp_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate from combst_applications, bst_workflow where bst_flowpoint=1 and bstapp_no='^'
insert into combst_mailcomments (mail_appno, mail_comments, mail_userid, mail_date, mail_touser, mail_pano) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

select mail_appno, mail_comments, mail_userid, to_char(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as mail_date, mail_touser, user_designation, usr_fname, mail_pano from combst_mailcomments, users where mail_appno='^' and mail_userid=usr_id order by to_date(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') desc
update combst_applications set bstapp_status = concat('c',substr(bstapp_status,2,2)), bstapp_closedate=sysdate where bstapp_no=?

select bst_companyname, org_name as brnlocationdesc, exp_desc as groupdesc, bst_custype from com_bstcustinfo, organisations, exposure, combst_applications where org_scode(+)=bst_brlocation and exp_id(+)=bst_companygroup and bst_companyid=bstapp_comid and bstapp_no='^'

select org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_zip, org_phone, org_fax, state_name, city_name from combst_applications, organisations, laps_states, laps_cities where bstapp_orgscode= organisations.org_scode and city_code(+)=org_city and state_code(+)=org_state and bstapp_no='^'

select COUNT(bstapp_no) from combst_mailbox a,combst_applications b,com_bstcustinfo c,organisations d,users e where a.bstmail_appno= b.bstapp_no and e.usr_id= a.bstmail_tousrid and upper(b.bstapp_status) not like 'C_' and c.bst_brlocation=d.org_scode and b.bstapp_comid= c.bst_companyid and a.bstmail_tousrid ='^' and b.bstapp_delflag='N' and a.bstmail_date =(select max(a1.bstmail_date) from combst_mailbox a1 where a.bstmail_appno= a1.bstmail_appno)
update combst_applications set bstapp_valuesin=? where bstapp_no=?
select max(bst_flowpoint) as bst_flowpoint from bst_workflow, workflow where bst_workid=wrk_flowid and wrk_flowtype='p'
insert into combst_orgrecmdations (combst_appno, combst_orgrecmds, combst_orglevel) values(?,?,?)
update combst_orgrecmdations set combst_refno=?, combst_refdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), combst_orgsignatories=? where combst_appno=?
delete from combst_orgrecmdations where combst_appno=? and combst_orglevel=?

select combst_refno, to_char(combst_refdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combst_refdate, combst_orgsignatories, combst_orgrecmds, combst_orglevel from combst_orgrecmdations where combst_appno='^' and combst_orglevel='^'
select combst_refno, to_char(combst_refdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as combst_refdate, combst_orgsignatories, combst_orgrecmds, combst_orglevel from combst_orgrecmdations where combst_appno='^'
insert into combst_bankingDetails (cb_appno,cb_banktype,cb_leadbank, cb_fundexist,cb_fundproposed,cb_nonfundexist,cb_nonfundproposed) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from combst_bankingDetails where cb_appno=?
select cb_leadbank,cb_banktype, cb_fundexist,cb_fundproposed,cb_nonfundexist,cb_nonfundproposed from combst_bankingDetails where cb_appno='^'
delete from combst_existcreditlimits where cf_appno=? and cf_facsno=?
insert into combst_existcreditlimits(cf_appno, cf_facsno, cf_facgroup, cf_bankname, cf_facnature, cf_existlimit, cf_approi, cf_presentroi) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update combst_existcreditlimits set cf_facgroup=?, cf_bankname=?, cf_facnature=?, cf_existlimit=?, cf_approi=?, cf_presentroi=? where cf_appno=? and cf_facsno=?
select (nvl(max(cf_facsno),0)+1) as srno from combst_existcreditlimits where cf_appno='^'
select cf_facsno,cf_facgroup, cf_bankname, cf_facnature, cf_existlimit, cf_approi, cf_presentroi from combst_existcreditlimits where cf_appno='^' and cf_facgroup='^' order by cf_bankname
select cf_facsno,cf_facgroup, cf_bankname, cf_facnature, cf_existlimit, cf_approi, cf_presentroi from combst_existcreditlimits where cf_appno='^'
select cd_comments from combst_defaulterslist where cd_appno='^'
delete from combst_defaulterslist where cd_appno=?
insert into combst_defaulterslist(cd_appno,cd_comments) values(?,?)
select cf_facsno from combst_existcreditlimits where cf_appno='^' and cf_facgroup=^ and cf_facgroup !=0
